title: No Blue Essence for first win of the day even in patch 7.23
body:
I have heard that Riot changed First Win of the Day rewards from 575 xp to 400 xp + 50 Blue Essence in patch 7.23.
I have updated to patch 7.23, how come it still says 575 xp at the first win of the day section in the mission pane?
Does anyone else have this issue?

replies.body:
I'm having the same issue, on both my accounts. I reported it via the in-client "Report a Bug" button, maybe it gets noticed, maybe it doesn't.

Honestly though, as someone who doesn't play much each day, I feel I'm probably better off with the 175 extra XP, rather than the 50 extra BE, so I'm not that fussed that I'm *personally* experiencing this issue.
To me, whether obtaining Blue Essence after First Win of the Day or not is not a big deal, I just don't like the fact when Riot says something happened but it didn't happen.

Its kind of a big deal actually. Imagine you want to buy something but you're just short of some BE so you're forced to level up or spend money. Its almost the same pain as the 99LP which is so close to getting promotion in ranked.

You can also do missions, and acquire Blue Essence from the missions icon.
Project missions icon contains Blue Essence, and you can acquire them by using tokens, to get tokens, you need to complete missions.
Do one mission to obtain the Project icon, then go to your loot, and click on the Project icon, and you will see Blue Essence.
Once you completed one or more mission, go to your loot, click on the Project missions icon, and click Blue Essence.
There is obviously more than one way to get Blue Essence.
If you want to do the missions, you need to hurry, complete as much missions as you can, before it expires.
But the Blue Essence you get through the missions Tokens isn't really worth the trade off for what you can get with the tokens.
One does not simply spend mission tokens on BE unless theres nothing else to spend on. So in the end the BE you get from mission is very little.
I mean, i'm pretty sure you get Less BE from taking the BE from FWotD instead of just taking the XP, unless you Low Roll every single time.

Well, one of the factors to consider would the how you roll on level capsules, another would be how often you're playing. Like, someone who plays several games per day would likely get less BE from the FWotD than considering the XP into their rolls, whereas someone who plays once a day for the FWotD might actually get more BE from FWotD rather than from the additional XP.

I might do the calculations a bit later just to see how it pans out.

I'm not sure if you actually trying to troll me or what....

No matter how many games you play, you are trading XP for BE, that rate doesn't change no matter how many games you play, so i'm not even sure what you are on about.

I feel like you're misunderstanding what I'm trying to say, but I probably haven't explained it very well to start with.

When it comes down to it, someone who plays several games per day (including FWotD) will gain more XP in a given day period than someone who plays only once per day for the FWotD. The first person might play 15-20 games (with maybe 2-4 being FWotD) to gain one levels worth of XP, while the other might play 4-6 games (all being FWotD) to gain the same amount of XP. In that situation, the second person is likely to get more BE from the FWotD bonus per level (for example 200-300) while the first is likely to only get less BE per level (for example 100-200).

So for the first person it *might* be more profitable, BE wise, for them to get the extra 175 XP rather than the 50 BE for a FWotD, which is my main point. It's not about *how many* games you play, it's about *how often* you play them (like several per day as opposed to one per day).

Except your maths is just bad, we aren't going for BE's worth per game, we are going BE's worth per XP point.

Low roll - 810 BE, 2880 XP, 1 BE= 3.55 XP, 175 XP = 49.29 BE

So that is a flat out Low Roll, and we are getting Slightly more BE if we low roll.

Next Roll - 900 BE, 2880 XP, 1 BE = 3.2 XP, 175 XP = 54.6 BE

And it only gets higher from here, to the point where, this trade off is just flat out not worth it.

EDIT: Just for the lols of how ripped off we are getting

High roll - 1260 BE, 2880 XP, 1 BE = 2.28 XP, 175 XP = 76.75 BE

feel they should give like a 30 min drop on the timer for fwotd for every game/win (cuz its riot) its on cd, so its pretty much exact same for those who play a few, but those who play often aren't punished like they are theives
I have this issue too. First win of the day IP used to give much more but they clearly want us to spend more money form the looks of BE. Can you post this on reddit to get more attention?
Same here been waiting a few days for it to be hotfixed but still yet nothing
Yep they said they would, but they didn't.
